creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel huipil with square cut neck opening; red ground; central panel has narrow yellow stripes while side panels have wider white stripes; fringe on one side; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; design consists of rows of human and zoomorphic figures interspersed with abstract geometric forms; side panels have white weft stripes.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
